name: bj-nfs1
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpg(s0, wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), wnf(s1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wi(wal(s0, wnf(s1, w0)), wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wi(wal(s0, wnf(s1, w0)), wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s0, wnf(s1, w0)), wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wnf(s1, w0)

comment: Shorter proof of ~ nfs1 (three essential steps instead of four). (Contributed by BJ, 2-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
